Package veksiak.vlevels.levelstructures

Class MutableLevelStructure

java.lang.Object
veksiak.vlevels.levelstructures.MutableLevelStructure
All Implemented Interfaces:
LevelStructure
public final class MutableLevelStructure extends Object implements LevelStructure
A level structure containing an unlimited or limited number of levels, in which each subsequent level requires an amount of XP changed by a certain amount from the amount of XP required for the previous level.

  • Constructor Details

    • MutableLevelStructure

      public MutableLevelStructure(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin creatingPlugin, int startingXPAmount, MutableLevelStructure.IntMathOperation mathOperation, boolean operateOnTotalXP, int preGenerate, boolean infinite)
      Parameters:
      creatingPlugin - The plugin that creates and uses this structure.
      startingXPAmount - Amount of XP required to reach level 2 higher than 0.
      mathOperation - Math operation that will be used to calculate XP required for next levels.
      operateOnTotalXP - If true, the calculations will be made on total XP. If false, the calculations will be made on total XP difference between level 2 and 3 [mathOperation(startingXPAmount)-startingXPAmount)].
      preGenerate - Amount of levels to calculate required XP for. This improves the performance of the structure by not requiring it to make the calculations later. If infinite is set to false, this can't be less than 2.
      infinite - Determines whether the structure should be infinite. If it is, its limit will be set to preGenerate. Using this option is unsafe. It is recommended to set the limit every time to prevent errors.

  • Method Details

    • getLevelNumber

      public Integer getLevelNumber(int xp)
      Specified by:
      getLevelNumber in interface LevelStructure
      Parameters:
      xp - Amount of total XP higher or equal to 0.
      Returns:
      The level that a player would have with specified amount of total XP, or 1 if the level is not found.

    • getTotalXPForLevel

      @Nullable public Integer getTotalXPForLevel(int level)
      Specified by:
      getTotalXPForLevel in interface LevelStructure
      Parameters:
      level - A level to calculate the xp for. If the structure isn't infinite, this mustn't be above the level limit.
      Returns:
      A minimal amount of total XP required to reach this level.
